department.ch: 環境工程研究所碩士班

goal.ch: 本特論課程為授課教師歷年來在水處理及水回收方面所進行的研究，以及過去在業界的實務經驗介紹。課程內容包含氫氟酸廢水的處理及氟的回收、染整廢水的處理及回收、鋼鐵產業廢水的處理及回收、薄膜於水處理回收技術的應用、循環材料於水處理技術的應用、水系統的防蝕與抑垢、水與能源等。使學生除了可提升在水處理方面的研究能量，更能提升在實務上的應用能力，強化未來進入職場的競爭力。
goal.en: "The special topics includes research topics conducted by the instructor and his practical experiences in the industrial. The content consists of treatment of hydrogen fluoride wastewater and fluorine recovery, textile wastewater treatment and reclamation, steel-making wastewater treatment and reclamation, application of membrane technology to water treatment and reclamation, application of circular materials to water treatment, prevention of corrosion and scaling in water systems, and water and energy. The objective of this course is to enable students to inspire their research in water treatment and enhance their capability in practical."

outline.ch:
"授課內容
1. 氫氟酸廢水處理
2. 氟回收
3. 染整廢水的處理及回收
4. 鋼鐵產業廢水的處理及回收
5. 薄膜於水處理回收技術的應用 (各種薄膜種類、技術介紹，如MBR, MF、UF、NF、RO、FO、EDR、MD、CDI)
6. 循環材料於水處理技術的應用 (如牡蠣殼、廢棄活性碳如何用於水處理技術)
7. 水系統的防蝕與抑垢
8. 水與能源"
outline.en:
"1. Treatment of hydrogen fluoride wastewater
2. Fluorine recovery
3. Textile wastewater treatment and reclamation,
4. Steel-making wastewater treatment and reclamation
5. Application of membrane technology to water treatment and reclamation (ex, MBR, MF、UF、NF、RO、FO、EDR、MD、CDI)
6. Application of circular materials to water treatment (ex, oyster shell and used activated carbon)
7. Corrosion and scaling in water systems
8. Water and energy"
